description:
Simplistic Style with White Background

Implement a minimalist UI design system with white background and icon library integration.

Technical Implementation:
- Design System: Create base theme configuration with white (#FFFFFF) background and minimalist color palette
- Icons: Integrate icon library (Lucide, Heroicons, or Feather Icons) for consistent SVG-based iconography
- CSS Framework: Configure minimal styling with focus on whitespace, clean typography, and subtle borders
- Component Library: Build or extend UI components with simplified variants

Styling Approach:
- Base Styles: White backgrounds, neutral grays for text (#333, #666, #999), minimal shadows
- Typography: System font stack or clean sans-serif (Inter, SF Pro, Roboto)
- Spacing: Consistent spacing scale (4px/8px increments)
- Borders: Subtle dividers using light gray (#E5E5E5, #F0F0F0)
- Icons: Monochrome icon set with consistent stroke width (1.5-2px)

Files/Components:
- theme.config.js/ts - centralized design tokens
- Icon wrapper component for consistent sizing and coloring
- Layout components with white backgrounds and minimal decoration
- Button, Card, Input variants in simplistic style

Implementation:
- Remove gradients, heavy shadows, and decorative elements
- Replace emoji with corresponding semantic icons from library
- Ensure sufficient contrast ratios for accessibility (WCAG AA minimum)
- Support dark mode toggle if needed (invert to dark background later)
